articles.author: BISWAJEET BANERJEE
articles.title: Fire engulfs hospital ward in northern India, killing 10 newborn babies - The Associated Press
articles.description: A fire tore through a neonatal intensive care unit in a hospital in northern India, killing 10 newborn babies and injuring 16 others. The fire occurred late Friday at a hospital in Jhansi city in India’s Uttar Pradesh state. Officials said the blaze spread qu…
articles.content:
LUCKNOW, India (AP) A fire tore through a neonatal intensive care unit in a hospital in northern India, killing 10 newborn babies and injuring 16 others, authorities said.
The fire occurred late Fri… [+2691 chars]
